title: Update Product Description
description: A merchandiser needs to update the description and specifications for an existing product to include new features.

tasks.description: Retrieve the product details using its SKU.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly pulls the existing product information for 'Laptop-XG-123'.

tasks.description: Update the product's description and specifications fields with the new text provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the product information in the PIM system.

tasks.description: Verify the changes by previewing the product page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the new description and specs are live on the storefront.
